title: Character Schema
description: Schema for character profiles in the 'They Burn Witches' storyworld

id.description: Unique identifier for this character, typically descriptive filename without .json extension

groups.description: Organizations, collectives, or communities the character belongs to

other_names.description: Nicknames, aliases, or titles the character is known by

personality.description: Concise description of character's core personality traits and essence

background.description: Character's history, origin story, and formative experiences

physical_description.description: Visual appearance, distinctive features, clothing style

dialogue_style.description: How the character speaks, verbal patterns, communication style

additionalProperties.description: Description of relationship with another character

role.description: Character's primary function, job, or position

augmentation_level.description: Extent and type of technological augmentations

economic_viability_rating.description: Rating of economic stability on a scale of 0-10

additionalProperties.description: Specific personality trait and its state during this time period

personality.description: How personality traits evolve during this time period

dynamic_attributes.description: Evolving attributes that change over time or in different contexts

bike_name.description: Name of character's bicycle or transportation mode

stream_tags.description: Social media or stream hashtags associated with character

favorite_nutrient_paste_flavor.description: Preferred food or nutrient paste flavor

training_philosophy.description: Character's approach or mantra regarding training or skill development

rage_trigger.description: What specifically angers or frustrates the character

objects.description: Significant items the character possesses or uses

signature_traits.description: Collection of distinctive traits that make the character unique

additionalProperties.description: Character's worldview or understanding at this story phase

worldview_evolution.description: How the character's understanding of the world changes across story phases

signature_questions.description: Key questions the character asks that reveal their nature and drive plot/theme development

thematic_function.description: What role this character plays in the story's larger themes and message

character_arc_summary.description: Brief description of how this character changes throughout the story
